channel.title: spokesperson required
channel.description:
We don't have a Whonix spokesperson. Looking for volunteer.
I am not good at / gifted / motivated [you pick] at creating slides, speaking in public on technology.
Needless to say, this is a non-anonymous task. Pseudonymous (real name only known to even organizers) at best.

item.title: spokesperson required
item.dc:creator: UnruffledST
item.description:
Not much, mainly just using LinkedIn, Bitcointalk, Discord servers my online presence is really at a minimal to be honest.

Care to explain what you hand in mind when looking for a spokesperson? Speaking at local events? Online marketing? Really looking to help out in any way possible.

Read full topic

item.title: spokesperson required
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Hello, thank you for your offer!

Do you have any online presence?

Read full topic

item.title: spokesperson required
item.dc:creator: UnruffledST
item.description:
I am down, I registered here with my real IP although having Whonix Live. My name is Christian Liz-Fonts and I would like to officially support Whonix. Please let me know what I can do to help spread the word out. I have no fear as even though having knowledge of how to obtain privacy and knowing that I might be on the FED’s radar; I do nothing illegal. I am a supporter of privacy.

Read full topic
